creator: karsten.merkle@artundweise.de
text:
I'm not sure, but
can't find anything in the specs wich wouldn't allow:

<jsp:forward page="test.jsp">
<%      if (true) {
%>
                <jsp:param name="param" value="5"/>
<%      }
%>
</jsp:forward>

this will produce
Expected "param" tag with "name" and "value" attributes without the "params" tag

creator: kin-man.chung@sun.com
text:
JSP.4.5 (p79,p80) explicitly disallow anything other than <jsp:param> in the
body of a <jsp:forward>
